caption: Geat staff and personality during my dine in. I would recommend it. Everything was a plus about the Sky Bar!!!!
Amazing views, amazing space. This is a newly renovated space and we can't wait to organize an event here!
Nice space despute limited bar selection...
This place is amazing. I love the vibe the atmosphere and its welcoming to all ages from 21-40
Really good

Im a very cocktail foward drinker and their bar menu was clubby. Their staff however were very nice and informative about anything I had to ask. I would definitely go back next time I'm in town just to have a down to earth conversation with a bartender
Silent party🔥🔥🔥
One of a kind in chicago.

I want to send a HUGE thank you to the SX team. From start to finish they were wonderful with setting our group up and helping me with a surprise for my girls. Brunch was delicious as well! Definitely plan to return again!
Cool new spot to drink and catch up with friends! Will be back again

Food was not good at all... ordered the cauliflower... came out drenched in buffalo sauce.. looked like vomit... tasted average.. ordered pork belly tacos.. could not tast pork belly.... smoothered in hot sause..  texture was bad..got chicken lettuce wraps.... chicken was fried and dirpped in sauses and not goood at all.... a place trying to be high end but totally average.
Ritzy spot. The girls (servers) r phenomenal. Gold silverware a bit much...
Absolutely Beautiful. Delicious food. Salmon quiche was delicious and Alex was amazing❤️🖤❤️🖤❤️
They canceled our 6 person reservation on a Friday night 30 minutes before we were supposed to be seated due to a private event.
Nice place 👍
Amazing staff and service!!!
Loved it! Great place to catch up and have bottomless mimosas!

A real gem that’s not so hidden but not so main stream. Such a nice spot was great drinks and great food service is impeccable with a great bartender who is juggling a lot of patrons and was able to hold a great conversation and make delicious drinks.  Recommend hitting the spot up as a nightcap.
Terrible coat check situation.
Fantastic New bar, great place to network. Staff is top notch, very chic, great music, a real cocktail lounge!
Beautiful, elegant, sexy, bar. food good, good drinks, clean, open VIP seating, nice bar to take your other half to on a drink date
I was there for a bday party. It has beautiful upscale decor. The seating is excellent for small - med sized groups. Quality glasses.  The fries are the bomb. I'll definetly go back.
I love the ambiance, I love the food , andI love  The view
Rude staff including bouncer
Amazing craft cocktails! Beautiful atmosphere without a pretentious vibe!
Very elegant and luxurious bar. Nice support and good selection of beer and whiskey very clean toilets
Our server wasn't the most friendly but drinks and decor we're good.
(Translated by Google) Excellent !!! Very good attention and soft music and you can talk quietly.  (Original) Excelente !!! Muy buena atención y la música suave y puedes conversar tranquilamente.
Beautiful and lovely ambience. Variety of setups.. great for a date!
For my friends 30th they were super nice and Awesome!
Great music, great atmosphere, but pricey. The views are amazing and the furniture is oversized for a swanky, out of the ordinary cool vibe.
All fake reviews

The decor was nice in the 00s and the bottled beers are decent but too cold. But that's about it. It's called a Sky Bar, however, it's on the 6th floor and that really should have been an indication of the experience that would follow. 3 terrible cocktails, shockingly bad and slow service on a very quiet Friday night, and a 21% service charge to slap you in the face for it all. Genuinely cannot discourage you enough from going here.
I do like decor but no choice from appetizers little burgers and sandwiches really! Disappointed!
Beautiful place but its definitely missing something
Very nice cocktail bar, Alex,Alexis, Jason and Mike had great teamwork for excellent service and were very friendly.
A bit overrated
It was ok...only two bartenders...big crowd

Had an unpleasant experience with this place on first time visit! On September 14th I visited this place first time and was there a brief time around one hour. Was at the bar twice, one time got two drinks ( captain morgan and sprite ) paid 24$. But some guy bumped in to me and my drink fell so I went to get another one and payed 12$. But on Monday I was shocked to see that I was charged 24$ as supposed to but for the second time 42$! Well I did not purchase any other drinks and definitely not left a 30$ tip. I always leave tip in cash! I called this place on Tuesday around 9 pm to asked to do investigation on this, and a nice guy who said he was manager for that night took my information and said that someone will contact me. Well no one did, so I called on Thursday again and no one had a clue what I’m talking about and I had to explain my self again, and of course they took information again and said someone will call back. NO ONE DID! I wanted to resolve this with them with out doing dispute on credit card but I guess they don’t care. It’s sad because the place it self is very nice, but the way the operate is sad. Just check your credit cards after you visit this place.

What an amazing time we had last Thursday (09/19) for the Cocktail Hour with French in Chicago in partnership with Grey Goose Vodka. Massive thanks to the Team (Erica, Loriana Justin and Jason) for putting everything together. Their hospitality was on point and cocktails where delicious.
Very unique place for unique drinks and food
NICE PLACE!!!
Talk about gorgeous!!!  Swanky!! Fantastic blend of modern and vintage. Chic, classy and cool, all at the same time.  Great pricing during happy hour!!

Last week I had an alumni event that my alma mater at SX Sky Bar was amazing! I've never been to SX Sky Bar before, but their staff was incredibly accommdating and exceptionally friendly. I'm really excited to go back!
It's a nice spot but pricey even at HH. If you are not sitting in the one section that gives you the view then it doesn't really feel like a rooftop.
Great spot. Ask for Carlos R
Had a good time there, great vibe. Was hoping for a few more options on the late night menu.
Nice place
The bartenders are skilled.
Beautiful atmosphere in the south loop with great views of the summer fireworks and a multitude of party spaces for rent. Food and beverages were great. Totally worth checking out!
The food and service are top notch
So SEXY and grown up Great atmosphere but not so good music

I went for an event and the event was very nice and it’s a beautiful venue however he staff needs serious work. The bar tender at the main bar couldn’t keep up and became flustered and rude. Everyone needed to have their drinks remade because it was pure water with a splash of alcohol. They messed up a vodka lemonade numerous times. They were also extremely slow taking orders and getting their drinks and food out. They ran out of clean glasses and started reusing dirty ones thinking no one would notice. To make matters worse I went to the other bar and the girls kept informing me that my card was saying invalid for a $35 charge. I used a credit card with a high limit so I knew that was impossible. I then get an alert stating she tried to charge my card $3,500 twice. So my credit card company flagged it and declined it. It’s hey frustrating to try to get out and have a good time when the establishment you’re paying is rude and negligent. To make matters worse we had a vip section
Could be an intimate experience. Expecting more of a view. Nice beverage selection and bites menu.

Had a business outing with my team and the SX staff couldn't have been more accommodating! Food and drinks were perfect and we all had a wonderful time. The decor is fabulous and the views on Grant Park are magnificent. Will certainly go back soon! Thank you.

Had breakfast on the patio. It was really good and the place is quite comfortable. The only thing I would criticize is that the waiters were wearing wrinkly shirts. I ordered Royal eggs Benedict with salmon on a croissant bun and potato pancakes. Really delicious food. A little lightly salted. The orange juice was freshly squeezed and had a slightly bitter taste. I would definitely recommend this place for having breakfast.

The ambiance was awkward on a Saturday to what I assume was poor party management. Dancers and performers seemed to be overbooked for a mum night (and the performers performed halfheartedly at that). Drinks were good and fairly priced, but a signature cocktail wasn't available on a Saturday night (!!) due to "not having gotten around to preparing infusions I guess" quoting the waitress. Lastly and most importantly, for a sky bar, the lounge is on the 6th floor of Michigan Ave with the only area accessible to the windows roped off for VIPs. You can't meander over, drink in hand, to enjoy the view. It's a sham to be marketed as a sky lounge with no view. Will do if strictly contained to the South Loop. Otherwise, head to River North for a better scene and better rooftop lounges.

This place is .... different. For one thing, all the male servers wear open collars and undone bow ties.  My girlfriends for the most part thought it was pleasingly casual and youthful. But to me that's how a man is attired when he's thinking he's about to get some - and if it's not completely consensual, oh well.  So it felt like at any moment the tone of the room could switch and this swarm of attentive gracious men could become a pack of entitled assaulters. It put me on edge.  Other than that the service was fine, the food was acceptable (not great), the cocktails were terrific (and pricey), the view was amazing.  The jury is out on the decor of the room. Most in my group thought it was weird. I thought it was pleasingly eclectic ... if they had stopped with 2 fewer elements. Its just too busy, with the crushed velvet AND the floral upholstery AND the purple mod sofas AND the shrub-covered wall AND the Asian inspired woodwork AND the space-age plastic AND the brass wall hangings ....
The latest trend, nice but not really a rooftop bar!
Work outing with 25ppl. Great vibe and feel. Food and drinks were fantastic. Servers Cristina and Orlando were very attentive. Beautiful views of Grant Park.

V.i.P section was great! You can never go wrong with bottomless mimosas and bellinis! The food was a bit over priced for how tiny the portions were, but the food was DELICIOUS!!! We all had a blast! The waitress was very sweet, a whole tray of mimosas were dropped on the floor but it was an attempt from her not to spill mimosas on a customer who suddenly backed up into her. She did a great job preventing him from getting wet by spilling them all over herself. She didn't let it effect her attitude at all and remained professional. She deserves a raise! Would recommend to people trying to have a fun Sunday brunch with a bunch of friends! Thanks for a fun time guys! Hope the waitress didn't get in trouble it wasn't her fault!

Waited for 10 minutes for the hostess to show up and seat us. They never showed. We seated ourselves and waited 20 minutes for service.  We left before getting a drink. Disorganized. Cool place but bad service
Jason the bartender is amazing! Check him out!!
What a great way to enjoy a beautiful view of Chicago! The food and drinks are amazing and I received great service from the staff! Try the Moscow Mule, shrimp and the cauliflower! They're delish!
Nice View

This restaurant confirmed my reservation on Opentable (see below). The day before the reservation they left me a voicemail telling me they were gonna be closed and they cancelled the reservation. Very unprofessional.

Doesn’t quite get it why the waiter ask me three times if I have finished before I actually finish my breakfast . It is only fifteen minutes but the restaurant seems eager to ask me to leave, with a lot of table unoccupied. And I wouldn’t say the waiter and waitress are very polite and nice.

There was literally a gap in this neighborhood for places fo hangout. Literally. Bc it's not quite in the heart of downtown and on weekends it's dead bc the main part of this area is school or work. SX is a much needed addition. The decor is interesting. Huge over sized chairs and a lot of attention was paid to the smallest details. Not a fan of the wall champagne art, it's tacky and so not done well. Perfect spot to pregame before an event. I'm sure with any event in Grant Park, e.g., the Taste of Chicago, concerts, etc., this place will be packed. SX specializes in craft cocktails and a merriad of small plate options such as sushi, chicken, etc. I suggest the Elotes Dip along with a classic Martini.
Nice decor. That’s it!! Food sucks really bad. Few tables have good view others u are just facing a wall. There are much better places than this one. Over rated!
Great view and drinks were in point!
What a beautiful spot. The staff was professional  and kind and make great drinks.
Love this new club ! Exactly what Chicago was missing... elegance , class and the right crowd. Many thanks to Joanna V for taking care of us!
One of the most elegant cocktail lounge in Chicago. Cabt wait to go back !
Funky but cool vibe. Nice views and bueatiful people. Apps and beer were delicious.
Service was particularly bad. Food was quality.

Do not give to this fraudulent place your money. If you try to split the bill, they will over charge your card & print out receipts that had nothing to do with your order until it adds up to a price THEY think makes sense.  Let’s start off with the positive...You can definitely get some great Instagram pictures in this place, but don’t let the looks fool you. My friends and I (three of us total) had a reservation to go get drinks/appetizers from SX Sky Bar before another event. We received our food/drinks but had to return one plate because the chicken was not cooked all the way through. (It happens, so we weren’t mad about it. The waitress Alexia nicely took it back to the chef and brought us a replacement fully cooked)  The real issue was our check... We explained to the waitress we wanted to split the bill three ways. (Cash & two cards) When she returned with our cards (over 20 minutes later) the original bill & the cash was no longer in the card holder and we were over charged on our cards. So we asked the waitress why this was and she said “that’s just how our system is. It doesn’t split the bill like you wanted.” We were not okay with this because the receipts she brought back for us to sign weren’t even items we had. The receipt mainly showed 1/8 Pepsi for multiple line items and one item we actually had until it added up to a certain price. So she said she will fix it with the manager. (Another 20minutes goes by) Then we asked for the manager. So the General Manager, (according to her card) ERICA came out saying the same thing the waitress said “that’s just how our system is.” Not once were they apologetic for these fraudulent receipts they were trying to have us sign. They had more of a “it is what it is” attitude towards us shrugging their shoulders. We asked multiple times for the original receipt they brought us before we gave our cards/cash, they finally admitted that they THREW IT AWAY. They said they couldn’t reprint it from their system because (again) “it doesn’t work that way.” She swiped our cards again with the lower price and said that when they close the system out, our bank statement will just show the one charge for the “correct” amount.  I will be watching for this correction to happen and give it a couple of days... But as of right now, the charge is still incorrect.  Let me be CLEAR! We still OVERtipped the waitress. This doesn’t have as much to do with the money as it does the principle of them being fraudulent, unapologetic, & never taking blame for THEIR mess up. If they were clear from the beginning with us when we asked to split the bill, there wouldn’t be an issue. The manager should have come out to speak with us right away instead of the 40minute wait between these transactions she claimed she was trying to “fix”  I get SX Skybar recently opened a couple of months ago, but I don’t understand how fast food restaurants can split the bill and give you the proper receipt but this ‘fancy’ place can’t....🤔🤨
Food and drinks were delicious! The fried cauliflower with buffalo sauce was surprisingly delicious.

Visiting the sky bar seemed like a great idea to look over Chicago and have a bite to eat so we stopped in. After ordering drinks our server explained the dishes on the menu. After deciding what we would like another one of their staff comes over to tell us the kitchen is closed because of shift change even though people were getting served around us. We asked how long the wait was which was an hour and for what we wanted to eat 2 hours. Then our waitress comes to take our order and we had to let her know that the establishment was not serving guests at the moment and she looked very surprised. They could of told us when we arrived of there setup process but obviously our waitress didn't know of them either. She was polite and very nice but establishment communication is lacking. And for trying to be such a classy place it was filthy. Food all over the floor, counter tops were dirty,for the prices and atmosphere they offer they could sweep and keep thing cleaner.
Good vibe.  Great service.  Ambience is good.  I came here for a networking venue.  No complaints.

Love the set-up, the background music was good. Our server needs seasoning but the manager stepped up and made things right to avoid a 1 star. The menu needs some changing around. At 2pm you should be able to order some lunch or whatever is on the menu rather than just brunch items. Customers should be able to choose what they want to order and not the chef stuck on sailing his ship. I’ll be back again for another try but this place just needs some small tweaks to better service the customers.
Great place! Food is super, staff is terrific. The whole vibe is top notch. Definitely recommend.
Great place with unique atmosphere, I did feel so relaxed with the music and food is great.
Until it's popular it's the best downtown bar. In 2 years it'll be so hot I'll be turned away based on my male gender.
It’s not a sky bar. It’s the sixth floor.  Had a reservation and was given lounge seats.  No table. Not remotely close to a window.  Left without ordering

(Translated by Google) Nice place. Have another drink after dinner. It was quiet and there was a relaxed atmosphere. The waiter was super friendly and helpful. You expect a bit of a view of the Chicago sky and skyscrapers. It is on the 6th floor, so no skyview. All in all a nice place for a relaxed drink.  (Original) Leuke plek. Nog een borrel wezen drinken na een etentje. Het was rustig en er hing een relaxte sfeer. De ober was super vriendelijk en behulpzaam. Je verwacht een beetje een uitzicht op de Chicago sky en wolkenkrabbers. Het is op de 6de verdieping, dus geen skyview. Al met al een leuke plek voor een relaxte borrel.
Amazing posh, summertime venue. Great craft cocktails and extensive bar menu.
Fun place, excellent vibe on Saturday night. Nice decor, music and cocktails.
Very good food and excellent presentation. Small portions but very filling

This place is SO bad. Whoever designed this space did a really bad job and has a high opinion of themselves. Our experience started with a hostess on an elevated stand which lo9ked ridiculous. She had to come down to speak to us. The view is awful (trees) and even if you wanted to see out of the windows the view is blocked and you have to pay $2000 minimum bottle service for the privilege. The liquor and wine selection is very poor and overpriced.  I give this place 6 months before it converts itself into a nice bar rather than a poor man’s club. This is a south loop bar with a decent view but nothing special. Get over yourselves.....

This place is swanky. Love the decor and ambiance. Drinks are good and the vibe feels classy, but comfortable. Love this addition to the south loop. It feels still very much like an undiscovered gem being so new. Looking forward to coming here in the summer. The one suggestion I would make it to open up the area near the view (rather than having it closed off for reservations). You can close it off for reservations in the future when it’s more full/more popular.
Great looking spot. Not impressed with anything else
Nice upscale restaurant and bar in the the South Loop. Great eclectic menu and delicious drinks.  I super recommend trying the truffle fries.

Blonde as hell with a twist of Manhattan. Sex in the city. A little getaway in chicago newest chic bar. Ambiance inviting. Food good and drinks crafty. Note: not an outdoor rooftop bar as some mentioned. But nice views overlooking Michigan ave.

So excited of the opening!! The roof top bar has an amazing view and very vibrant ambiance. Very friendly staff & excellent services. Signature cocktails were so yummy! I love the decor, definitely very luxury! Cant wait to bring my boyfriend! I also love the bathroom, very elegant!
Great addition to the South Loop

Wow! SX Sky Bar is the definition of luxury. The staff were so friendly, making you feel welcomed and exclusive. The food and drinks were to die for while not being over priced! I had the pork belly wrap... highly recommended! I can’t wait for my next night out at SX Sky Bar, definitely an experience not worth waiting on.
Great food, drinks, and service! We will be back.
